name: A20 heavy tank
caption: Prototype A20E1 during a mobility test, 1940.
author: Author Name
description: British infantry tank prototype developed early in WW2, later evolving into the Churchill tank.

name: Type 3 medium tank Chi-Nu
caption: Photograph of a Chi-Nu taken after the Japanese surrender.
author: Author Name
description: A late-war Japanese tank designed to counter American armor, though it saw little combat.

name: T-90
author: Author Name
description: Modern Russian main battle tank, evolved from the T-72 with improved protection and electronics.

name: Challenger 2
author: Author Name
description: British main battle tank known for its advanced armor and exceptional accuracy.

name: K2 Black Panther
author: Author Name
description: One of the most advanced main battle tanks in the world, developed by South Korea.
